item.title: Sally add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sally add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sally add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Remember that wherever your heart is, there you will find your treasure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sally add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Don't give in to your fears. If you do, you won't be able to talk to your heart." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sally add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description:
"But love is always new. Regardless of whether we love once, twice, or a dozen times in our life, we always face a brand-new situation. Love can consign us to hell or to paradise, but it always takes us somewhere. We simply have to accept it, because it is what nourishes our existence. If we reject it, we die of hunger, because we lack the courage to stretch out a hand and pluck the fruit from the branches of the tree of life. We have to take love where we find it, even if that means hours, days, weeks of disappointment and sadness.
The moment we begin to seek love, love begins to seek us. And to save us." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sally add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If pain must come, may it come quickly. Because I have a life to live, and I need to live it in the best way possible. If he has to make a choice, may he make it now. Then I will either wait for him or forget him." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sally add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Anyone who loves in the expectation of being loved in return is wasting their time." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "فَرْقٌ كبير بين أن تحبها لأنها جميلة، وأن تكون جميلة لأنك تحبها." -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "لكي تكوني سعيدة معه يجب أن تفهميه كثيرا وتحبيه قليلا‏,‏ ولكي تكون سعيدا معها يجب أن تحبها كثيرا ولا تحاول فهمها ابدا" -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "لو كنت في كل مره افكر فيك لمست نجما من نجوم السماء‏,‏ لاصبحت السماء مهرجانا من النور‏" -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "عكس الحب ليس الكره وإنما المبالاة فإننا لانكره الا من نبالي بهم !" -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "فرق كبير بين أن تحبها لأنها جميلة، وأن تكون جميلة لأنك تحبها" -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by انيس منصور
item.description: "السعادة تنتقل بالعدوى .. فلا تنتظر عدوى أحد .. بل كن حاملاً لهذا الميكروب" -- انيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "الذي لا يعرف الصبر ، لا يعرف الحب" -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "هي عِندها عقل لا يدق و هو عنده قلب لا يرى .... هذه هي المأسآة الأبدية !" -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by أنيس منصور
item.description: "المرأة التي أحببتها ليس لها ماض, فقد ولدت يوم احببتها. والمرأة التي تزوجتها ليس لها مستقبل فقد ماتت يوم تزوجتها" -- أنيس منصور

item.title: Sally add a quote by mario puzo
item.description: "it's just business nothing personal..." -- mario puzo

item.title: Sally add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?" -- George Carlin

item.title: Sally add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Meow” means “woof” in cat." -- George Carlin

item.title: Sally add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Isn’t making a smoking section in a restaurant like making a peeing section in a swimming pool?" -- George Carlin

item.title: Sally add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "People always tell me "Have a nice day." Well what if I don't want to? What if I want to have a crappy day?" -- George Carlin

item.title: Sally add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Don't give your money to the church. They should be giving their money to you." -- George Carlin

item.title: Sally add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Never let the brain idle. ‘An idle mind is the devil’s workshop.’ And the devil’s name is Alzheimer’s. " -- George Carlin

item.title: Sally add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Weather forecast for tonight: dark." -- George Carlin

item.title: Sally add a quote by غسان كنفاني
item.description: "إن شراستك كلها إنما هي لإخفاء قلب هش" -- غسان كنفاني
